channel.title: ZVS on SUPER-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in ZVS on SUPER-Lab

item.title: High-Frequency Bidirectional Resonant Converter for High Conversion Ratio and Variable Load Operation
item.description: This paper proposes a bidirectional resonant converter design in which the rectifier and the inverter switches can be driven with the same gate signal at frequencies above 10 MHz. The proposed design enables efficient operation at > 10 MHz for applications which require high conversion-ratio bidirectional power delivery. We demonstrate a 200 W 13.56 MHz 210 V-to-30 V bidirectional converter with a peak efficiency of 90%.
